1:
Yahweh, I am not proud;
\q2 I do not deserve to achieve impressive things in life.
\q1 I do not worry about problems that are too difficult for me to solve.
\q1
2:
Instead, I am calm and peaceful in my inner being
\q2 like a small child who no longer nurses but is happy to be with its mother.
\q2 In the same way, I am peaceful within my inner being.
\b
\q1
3:
You, my fellow Israelites, confidently expect that Yahweh will do good things for you
\q2 now and forever!
131:
\d A psalm written by David for people going up to the temple to worship.
\b
\q1
